programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! programme.desc: Will Paik Jong-won be able to successfully run a restaurant overseas? With the help of Lee Jang-woo, BamBam, Yuri and John Park, he will start his business in the barren land of K-food – Africa and Italy.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2
programme.desc: Continuing the story of its first season, Kim Wook and Jang Pan-seok will try to find the bodies of missing people and chase after the truth behind their deaths in another village of dead spirits.

programme.title: Heo's Diner
programme.desc: Based on a web novel of the same name, a man from Joseon dynasty accidentally travels 400 years into the future and opens a restaurant unintentionally in modern Seoul.

programme.title: Heo's Diner
programme.desc: Based on a web novel of the same name, a man from Joseon dynasty accidentally travels 400 years into the future and opens a restaurant unintentionally in modern Seoul.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A business minded networker partnered with unlicensed but talented surgeon to open a whole new primetime of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Tiger Cage 2
programme.desc: Gangsters pursue a Hong Kong lawman framed for murder and a lawyer they believe is linked to laundered money.

programme.title: Hellboy: Rise Of The Blood Queen
programme.desc: Hellboy, a supernatural being, protects the earth with the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense. Soon, he faces the blood queen, an ancient witch who wants to bring about the end of the world

programme.title: Remember
programme.desc: The story of Pil-Joo, an Alzheimer's patient in his 80s, who lost all his family during the Japanese colonial era, and devotes his lifelong revenge before his memories disappear, and a young man in his 20s who helps him.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A former champion martial artist struggles to find and seeks revenge on those responsible for her sister's disappearance.

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: Beautiful Disaster
programme.desc: College freshman Abby tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to bad boy Travis.

programme.title: The Man Standing Next
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Korea is under the absolute control of President Park, who controls the KCIA, the organization with the edge over any branch of government.

programme.title: Death Forest 3
programme.desc: Uchida Mayu is a high school student in a peaceful town near Tokyo. Meanwhile,, Mayu's uncle Uchida Kazuki is a freelancer writer, who chases after the hideous monster Yoshie who attacks people.

programme.title: Mark Felt
programme.desc: The true story of Mark Felt, popularly known as `Deep Throat', who gave information leading to the Watergate scandal.

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them

programme.title: New Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: A fighter helps a woman protect her martial-arts school in World War II Taiwan.

programme.title: Khali The Killer
programme.desc: An East L.A. hit man decides to take one last job before retiring to help support his ailing grandmother's end of life care. But everything falls apart when he develops empathy for his last target and has to make the toughest decision.

programme.title: Michael J. Fox: Actor, Activist, Optimist
programme.desc: Michael J. Fox's life, from his rise to fame to a Parkinson's diagnosis at 29, has been nothing short of a real-life movie, marked by unexpected twists and remarkable resilience.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: From heiress of a giant media empire to wanted felon, witness the strange saga of the Patty Hearst kidnapping of 1974.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes

programme.desc: See the secret remains of a Nazi concentration camp built on British soil. Follow a world-renowned forensic investigator to Alderney, in the Channel Islands, where she races to uncover evidence before the local government can shut her search down.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Chowder gets possessed by a demon bird named Florentine, and it's up to Mung, Truffles and Shnitzel to save him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to “unstick” the crew from one another.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Queen of Mystery Season 2
programme.desc: Queen of Mystery is back! Housewife-turned-investigator Seolok and passionate detective Wanseung collaborate to solve mysterious cases and cure the hearts of those who were wounded by crimes along the way.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Barumbadings

programme.title: Married With Children S1 E08 - Peggy Sue Got Work
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: CSI S3 E05 - Abra Cadaver
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: ALF S1 E02 - Strangers In The Night
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 E21 - Chatterbox
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E01 - The Foundling
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Jacob and Don venture into a cursed pirate swamp. Willie fishes solo after Little Willie takes a land job. Ronnie and Timmy battle poachers. Troy gambles on Pickle's new hotspot.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: With the snow comes a rush of emotion and the participants are tested in their resolve to keep working towards the $500,000 prize.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: "King of the Swamp" Troy Landry and Pickle Wheat mix it up with locals. Tes puts her skills to the test hunting without her partner Bill. Zak and Bruce return to Viper Alley, and Dusty hunts for a legend.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A German-American pilot, Dieter Dengler, uses survival skills honed as a child to escape a secret prison in Laos in the early years of the Vietnam war.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Things get scary when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King. Will all work and no play make Corey a dull boy? Then, Chum gets a sweet lesson when he checks out signed Steve Aoki merchandise.

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: Surfers by day, cat burglars by night – a trio of thieves in New York attempt to steal the priceless jewels at the American Museum of Natural History.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In a new twist on the classic car challenge, four smiths create a knife from a mangled mess of a vehicle. After an intense round of testing, two smiths return home to recreate a set of curved katars.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the remaining survivalists near day 50, conditions at Reindeer Lake intensify. Desperation rises as the temperatures continue to drop, and personal demons bubble to the surface.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: Thieves steal half a billion dollars in masterpieces from the Gardner Museum. An exhaustive search has failed to recover the stolen goods. Who orchestrated the biggest art heist in history and why?

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The dark origin stories behind some of history's most notorious methods of execution, from the guillotine to the electric chair.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Laging Umaga
programme.desc: Teresa (Gina Pareño) is pregnant by her rich boyfriend Edwin (George Estregan). But Edwin is sent away to manage their provincial plant by his father (Don Lauro) to stop the impending unsuitable match. Father and son agree that if after two years and Edwin is still in love with Teresa, Don Lauro will no longer oppose the marriage.

programme.title: Magtago Ka na sa Pinanggalingan Mo
programme.desc: Magtago Ka na sa Pinanggalingan Mo

programme.title: Pugante
programme.desc: Daniel (Dante Varona) is the best police officer the force has. He is assigned to track down five hardened criminals who have escaped from prison. But he needs the help of "Mandong Lundag" (Jess Lapid, Jr), a convicted thief and a former gangmate of the escaped convicts.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Tatlong Mukha ng Pag-ibig
programme.desc: Three different kinds of love stories in one picture, all of them top-billed by Sharon Cuneta.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Mamachari bikes, which originated in Japan, are designed to meet the needs of all kinds of people. They even helped women enter the workforce. We discover what makes them so unique and special.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: An auto repair shop in Yokkaichi, Mie Prefecture serves a rice bowl once a week. Ms. Kuroda, who helped run the company for years with her late husband, started making these meals at the age of 70.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Spring oysters, packed with umami before spawning, have been attracting attention in recent years. We visit Hiroshima, Japan's largest oyster-producing region, to learn more.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: The imperial court 1200 years ago used cloth dyed with the colors of prayer, many of which are lost to time. Some today are fascinated with these forgotten colors and are attempting to revive them.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mishiro Kenshi creates installations with ornate bamboo lanterns known as "take-akari." He talks about the potential of the craft, including his work to bring light to disaster-stricken communities.

programme.title: On the Wings 5min.
programme.desc: Journey through the air on virtual excursions from Tokyo Haneda to regional airports all over Japan. This time it's New Ishigaki Airport; islands in an emerald sea from over 40,000ft.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks
programme.desc: Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog Home Alone
programme.desc: When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World
programme.desc: Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Potato City
programme.desc: Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: The New House
programme.desc: Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Babysitting
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Ballet Lesson
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: The Tree House
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Hiccupism / Silence please
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail
programme.desc: Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: The Tiger Treasure
programme.desc: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: Pups Save the Puppets
programme.desc: Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery
programme.desc: Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: See What You Made Me Do - Episode 3
programme.desc: Jess implores us to see the realities of domestic abuse in our communities. Combating our rates of domestic abuse also needs systemic change: like shifting our culture of policing.

programme.title: Alone Australia - Day 21: 4 People Remain
programme.desc: Survival in the Tasmanian wilderness is proving just one part of the challenge for participants. The emotional isolation is weighing heavily, and for one it proves too much.

programme.title: Anzac Dawn Service From Sydney 2025

programme.title: Anzac Dawn Service From Canberra 2025
programme.desc: As Dawn breaks across Australia on Anzac Day, the ABC takes you to Canberra for the National Anzac Dawn Service from the Australian War Memorial. Presented by James Glenday.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Anzac Day
programme.desc: James Glenday and Catherine Murphy are joined by Charles Brice to bring you a special edition of News Breakfast on Anzac Day, covering commemorations from right across the country. Plus all the day's news, sport and weather.

programme.title: ABC News On Anzac Day - Episode 1

programme.desc: Melissa Mackay brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, plus live reports and comprehensive coverage of commemorations to mark Anzac Day.

programme.title: Anzac Day: Gallipoli Dawn Service 2025
programme.desc: The Gallipoli Dawn Service from Anzac Cove on the Gallipoli Peninsula in Turkiye. 2025 marks the 110th anniversary of the action by Australian, New Zealand and other Commonwealth troops in 1915.

programme.title: Anzac Day: Villers-Bretonneux Dawn Service 2025
programme.desc: One of the key commemorative events on Anzac Day. From the Australian National Memorial in Villers-Bretonneux, France - we honour the service and sacrifice by Australians on the Western Front in WWI.

programme.title: No Ordinary Rescue S2
programme.desc: Haze from wildfires in Thailand and Indonesia have caused millions to fall ill and destroying their land. Citizens are learning to firefight, putting everything on the line to quell the raging fires.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Better Off Zed
programme.desc: A lazy man in his thirties is happy to sit out the zombie apocalypse in his fortified suburban abode, until his wife acts on a more pragmatic strategy for survival, forcing him to become a zombie killer!

programme.title: Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Blue Green Ghost
programme.desc: Based on a popular video game of the same name, six high school students are trapped in an abandoned haunted house where they are being pursued by an enigmatic blue Oni (Blue Green Ghost). After a series of terrifying incidents, are they able find a way out and finally escape from the haunted house?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A couple in North Carolina shares their home with a shadow figure. A werewolf stalks a man's backyard in Brazil. A store in Taiwan has a ghostly customer. Plus much more terrifying paranormal footage.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When hip-hop artist Chucky Trill is gunned down on a highway after leaving a nightclub, Gwinnett County Homicide must retrace his steps to find the killer.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 9th June 2017, 26-year-old Chinese scholar Yingying Zhang is last seen getting into a car driven by Brendt Christensen, who had been trying to lure women. Yingying is never seen again.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A heated argument turns terrifying as a woman is threatened by her boyfriend. Waiting at a gas station after calling 911, she grabs a machete to defend herself.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: After police respond to a shooting in Chicago, a man is arrested and charged. He claims that he was attacked with a hammer before reaching for his weapon.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: When three people are gunned down in a Tulsa home, detectives face two suspects, and a web of lies. Prosecutors are left with circumstantial evidence to clinch the case against a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jim's daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cédric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne take on a real challenge with a couple from Quebec. Rémi loves the city and its restaurants; Benoît prefers nature and tranquillity. Evelyne suggests the trendy district of Limoilou, whilst Corey takes them to the peace and quiet of Charlesbourg.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: With a new invention by her friend, Alix wants to help Rabbit to capture a picture of a fabulous animal that is very rarely seen in the land of the Wonderfolk.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone doesn't want to get back in touch with the children from her first marriage without knowing whether her disease is hereditary. Simon confronts his client Sophie who makes the most of the moment to make a dramatic revelation about his father's past.
